main event: A hot air balloon was observed in Memphis, Tennessee on 31 August 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a Ford tail light., The balloon emitted yellow light and appeared to break up, sending sparks., The sighting lasted for 10 minutes., The course of the balloon was to the southeast., This observation was part of the Project Blue Book records which investigated UFO sightings.
witness description: A civilian male, approximately 30 years old.
